5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Salamah said:“Aishah narrated to me that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed Witr with one Rak’ah, then he prayed two Rak’ah in which he recited while sitting, then when he wanted to bow, he stood up and bowed.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ بَعْدَ الْوِتْرِ جَالِسًا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the two Rak’ah sitting down after Witr
